app_description: Translator integrates three major translation platforms with photo translation intelligent speech recognition and voice into text translation black technology! Relying on the latest artificial intelligence technology high precision image and speech recognition model easy and intelligent translation! The world outside is very exciting and the world outside is very helpless. No foreign language no matter where you go. As long as you have this translation tool no matter where you are in the world you don t have to worry about language problems. Multi language translation function can let you go. Core functions 1 text translation: integrated Baidu Google adao translation accurate and authentic text translation! 2 photo translation: take photo recognition translation album selection map translation optional photo one click translation high efficiency translation tool. 3 voice translation: the latest artificial intelligence technology high resolution vocal recognition turned into text translation! 4 dialogue translation: say a translation directly read instant communication accurate translation travel and communication must travel abroad. 5 translation collection: word new words unfamiliar common words classic famous sentences travel special language business daily language all in one collection look and read anytime anywhere. 6 practical settings: 1 support for setting the translation display font size 2 support for setting the pronunciation speed tone volume. contact us If you have any questions please feel free to contact us. Your suggestions and feedback are the great driving force for our product improvement. Thanks to everyone who uses our products to support our partners we have been striving to be the best come on! Cooperation and problem feedback contact email: bzq1 qq.com tjs101 live.cn
